Name: Frankenstein: Master of Death
About the game: Victor Frankenstein, an old friend and a brilliant scientist has managed to resurrect the dead! However the border between life and death is fragile and Victor has learned the hard way that this balance should not be tempered with... Face terrible monsters, overcome obstacles and solve clues. Save unhappy creatures from being a victim of an extremely inhuman experiment and stop the baron Igor. Help restore the course of nature and save Victor and his wife, Elizabeth! A new look into a classic story Solve fantastic puzzles Stunning 2k HD graphics
